@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the amount the wheel has been scrolled

@param.name: @param
@param.body: axis {String?} Optional parameter which defines the scroll axis. The value can either be "x" or "y".
@param.description: Optional parameter which defines the scroll axis. The value can either be "x" or "y".

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Integer} Scroll wheel movement for the given axis. If no axis
is given, the y axis is used.
@return.desc:
Scroll wheel movement for the given axis. If no axis
is given, the y axis is used.
